text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires that for every control point, the framework must identify both an accountable owner (process owner) and an assurance owner (who will provide independent verification to the Audit Committee). The candidate answer provides Control Points, KPIs, and Reporting Cadence, but it completely omits the required identification of the 'accountable owner' and the 'assurance owner' for any of the listed controls.", "criterion_id": "7114fc44-7a89-4d14-850e-1791b7474fa4"}
